definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: po/liv (tw=n)gramma/twn, + (LXX:B Ju Jdg 1:11) Kariasswfar: ancient name of [[דְּבִיר]] (v. II. ´[[ד]]:

definitions.title: 2 c
definitions.body: ) (perh. [[־סׂפֵר]]´[[ק]]: scribe-town, cf. LXX supr. also SyrVer and Egyptian Baᵢ-tiṯu-pa-ïra, house of scribe, WMM:As. u. Eur. 174 Buhl:Geogr.274, cf. GFM:Ju);—Jos 15:15, Jos 15:16, Ju Jdg 1:11, Jdg 1:12; another name is [[־סַנׇּה]]´[[ק]]: Jos 15:49 (but LXX po/liv gramma/twn, hence rd. perh. [[־ספר]]´[[ק]]:, so Steuern), in S. Judah; on site (prob. Dhoherîye, 5 h. SW. from Hebron) v. II. [[דְּבִיר]]
